CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
</t><stat>INSERT INTO users (user_id, username, email, password) SELECT 1, 'JohnDoe', 'johndoe@example.com', 'password123';</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,

    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE accounts ( account_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, account_type VARCHAR(50), balance DECIMAL(10,2), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) )

CREATE TABLE transactions ( transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, account_id INT, amount DECIMAL(10,2), transaction_type VARCHAR(20), transaction_date TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts(account_id) )</t><stat>INSERT INTO accounts (account_id, user_id, account_type, balance) SELECT 6, 6, 'checking', 4000.00</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE users ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100), password_hash VARCHAR(100) )

CREATE TABLE transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, account_id INT, amount DECIMAL(10, 2), transaction_type VARCHAR(255), transaction_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE accounts (account_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, account_type VARCHAR(255), balance DECIMAL(10, 2))

CREATE TABLE transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, account_id INT, amount DECIMAL(10, 2), transaction_type VARCHAR(255), transaction_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), password VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE accounts (account_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, account_type VARCHAR(255), balance DECIMAL(10, 2))</t><stat>INSERT INTO accounts (account_id, user_id, account_type, balance) SELECT 2, 1, 'Checking', 500.00</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE investments (investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, account_id INT, investment_type VARCHAR(255), amount DECIMAL(10, 2), investment_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE investments (investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, account_id INT, investment_type VARCHAR(255), amount DECIMAL(10, 2), investment_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, account_id INT, amount DECIMAL(10, 2), transaction_type VARCHAR(255), transaction_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE accounts (account_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, account_type VARCHAR(255), balance DECIMAL(10, 2))</t><stat>INSERT INTO investments (investment_id, account_id, investment_type, amount, investment_date) SELECT 1, 3, 'Stocks', 500.00, '2022-02-01'</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), password VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE accounts (account_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, account_type VARCHAR(255), balance DECIMAL(10, 2))

CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), password VARCHAR(255))</t><stat>insert into investments (investment_id, account_id, investment_type, amount, investment_date) select 3, 3, 'real estate', 1500.00, '2022-02-15'</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE investments (investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, account_id INT, investment_type VARCHAR(255), amount DECIMAL(10, 2), investment_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), password VARCHAR(255))</t><stat>insert into investments (investment_id, account_id, investment_type, amount, investment_date) select 3, 3, 'real estate', 1500.00, '2022-02-15'</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);</t><stat>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, password) SELECT 1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', 'password123';</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,

  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,

  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL

  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,

  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)

  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)

  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);</t><stat>insert into users (user_id, username, email, password) select 2, 'jane_smith', 'jane.smith@example.com', 'securepass';</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);</t><stat>insert into users (user_id, username, email, password) select 2, 'jane_smith', 'jane.smith@example.com', 'securepass';</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,

  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);</t><stat>insert into users (user_id, username, email, password) select 2, 'jane_smith', 'jane.smith@example.com', 'securepass';</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Loans (

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);</t><stat>INSERT INTO Accounts (account_id, user_id, account_type, balance) SELECT 1, 1, 'Savings', 1000.00;</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);</t><stat>INSERT INTO Accounts (account_id, user_id, account_type, balance) SELECT 1, 1, 'Savings', 1000.00;</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)

  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);</t><stat>INSERT INTO Accounts (account_id, user_id, account_type, balance) SELECT 1, 1, 'Savings', 1000.00;</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,

  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);</t><stat>insert into accounts (account_id, user_id, account_type, balance) select 1, 1, 'savings', 1000.00;</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);</t><stat>INSERT INTO Accounts (account_id, user_id, account_type, balance) SELECT 2, 2, 'Checking', 500.00;</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);</t><stat>INSERT INTO Accounts (account_id, user_id, account_type, balance) SELECT 2, 2, 'Checking', 500.00;</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);</t><stat>INSERT INTO Accounts (account_id, user_id, account_type, balance) SELECT 2, 2, 'Checking', 500.00;</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (

  user_id INT NOT NULL,

  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  user_id INT NOT NULL,

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL

  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)

  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,

  transaction_date DATE,

  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,

  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)

  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);</t><stat>insert into transactions (transaction_id, account_id, amount, transaction_date) select 2, 1, 50.00, '2022-01-20';</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (

);

  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,

  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,

  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,

);

  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);</t><stat>insert into investments (investment_id, account_id, investment_type, amount, start_date) select 2, 1, 'bonds', 300.00, '2022-03-10';</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

  password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL

  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (

  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,

CREATE TABLE Loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  interest_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  loan_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(account_id)
);

  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,

  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
